Package controller

Class LoginScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the LoginScreen.fxml document and not meant to be instantiated. The Main screen authenticates the User's login credentials, as well determines the User's locale.

    • lambdaRequirement2

      public LEInterface2 lambdaRequirement2

    • lambdaRequirement1

      public LEInterface1 lambdaRequirement1
      This is the lambda expression that checks the User's locale when the application is launched. This is necessary so that the resource bundle may be utilized if appropriate.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      This method is called by the FXMLLoader.load() call contained in the start() method of the Main class. The method checks the User's locale in order to change the language to French if appropriate. The method also flushes the login_activity.txt file so that the file is created fresh each time the application is launched.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      rb - An unreferenced ResourceBundle object passed automatically
      url - An unreferenced URL object passed automatically

    • recordLoginAttempt

      public void recordLoginAttempt() throws IOException
      This method records data each time a login is attempted. The characters entered for the username and password, as well as a time stamp and the outcome of the attempt are appended to the login_activity.txt file in the root folder of the application.
      Throws:
      IOException - An IOException is thrown if the file to be written to cannot be located.

    • loginValidation

      public void loginValidation(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method verifies the User's login credentials. The username and password are checked against the data in the database to verify the user is authorized to use the application.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener in the MainScreen FXML document

    • getUserLocale

      public static Locale getUserLocale()
